hero.title: Yoga & Somatics for a grounded, embodied life.
hero.body: Support for body awareness, stress regulation, and inner balance—through yoga, somatic sessions, coaching, sound healing, and workshops (online & in-person).

google.ariaLabel: {{rating}} out of 5 on Google, based on {{count}} reviews

intro.title: Welcome
intro.p1: Heart 2 Heart Somatics is a space to slow down, reconnect, and return to what you can feel — breath, body, and presence.
intro.p2: Mariem combines yoga, somatic guidance, coaching, and sound healing to support nervous system regulation, self-awareness, and steady inner balance.
intro.p3: Sessions and workshops are offered for individuals and groups — online and in person — held with care, clarity, and respect for your pace.
intro.p4: Whether you're navigating stress, transitions, or simply want to deepen your relationship with your body, you're welcome exactly as you are.

courses.title: Healing Options
courses.subtitle: A short overview of what's available. Tap “Learn more” for details.

sound-healing.title: Sound Healing
sound-healing.description: A calming, immersive experience—sound as a space for rest and connection.
sound-healing.details:
A spacious 1:1 session designed for deep rest and reconnection.

We begin with a short check-in, intention setting, and a gentle arrival in the body. You'll be guided through grounding and regulation practices before we move into an immersive sound journey.

Afterwards, we take time for integration—so you leave feeling more settled, clear, and supported.

sound-bath.title: Sound Bath
sound-bath.description: A group sound journey—for deep relaxation and integration.
sound-bath.details:
A shared sound experience for small groups—calm, immersive, and deeply restorative.

You'll be invited to get comfortable with cushions and blankets while sound creates a safe container for slowing down. This is ideal if you want to decompress, reset, and feel more grounded.

No prior experience needed—just come as you are and allow yourself to receive.

yoga-and-meditation.title: Yoga & Meditation
yoga-and-meditation.description: Mindful movement and breath—for stability, flexibility, and inner calm.
yoga-and-meditation.details:
A practice that balances mindful movement, breath, and presence—without pressure or performance.

Yoga (group): a supportive, body-aware flow to build steadiness, mobility, and calm.
Meditation (1:1): guided sessions to settle the mind, strengthen inner focus, and create space for clarity.

All sessions are adaptable—especially helpful if you want consistency, softness, and a practice that meets you where you are.

meta.price: Yoga: From €30 per person / €100 per month

somatic-coaching.title: Somatic Coaching
somatic-coaching.description: 1:1 support to explore patterns, boundaries, and body-based resources.
somatic-coaching.details:
Somatic coaching offers 1:1 support to explore patterns, boundaries, and resources through the lens of the body.

Sessions combine practical reflection with embodied tools—so you can notice what's happening in real time, build regulation skills, and strengthen your capacity to respond with more choice.

Gentle, respectful, and paced to what feels safe—this is for you if you want sustainable change, not quick fixes.

trainings-and-workshops.title: Trainings & Workshops
trainings-and-workshops.description: Workshops for personal growth, regulation, and embodied learning.
trainings-and-workshops.details:
Interactive trainings and workshops for groups—designed to translate somatic understanding into everyday life.

Formats can include education, guided practices, reflection, and simple tools you can apply immediately. Suitable for teams, communities, and private groups.

Dates and topics change—subscribe to receive new workshop announcements and upcoming offerings.

ifs.title: Internal Family Systems (IFS)
ifs.description: A gentle approach to understanding inner parts with curiosity and compassion.
ifs.details:
Internal Family Systems (IFS) is a gentle, respectful approach to understanding your inner world.

Together we explore ‘parts'—protective patterns, emotions, and inner responses—with curiosity and compassion. This can create more clarity, self-trust, and inner steadiness.

Sessions are paced, supportive, and grounded—so you can meet yourself with more understanding and less overwhelm.

about.title: My Journey
about.summary:
Healing doesn't happen all at once. It unfolds—step by step, across time, places, and seasons of our lives.

Heart 2 Heart Somatics grew from this lived experience—gentle, grounded support for stress regulation, body connection, and inner balance.
about.body:
Healing doesn't happen all at once. It unfolds—step by step, across time, places, and seasons of our lives.

I left Tunisia at seventeen and began building a life in Italy. I studied, worked long hours, and learned to keep going—often relying on resilience alone. For a while, that felt like enough. Until life asked for something different.

Moving to Germany, and later spending time in Dubai and the Netherlands, became turning points. I started therapy and stepped into personal development training where I discovered embodiment practices—the moment I realized my body had been speaking all along. Learning to listen changed everything.

From there I deepened my path through somatic coaching, Internal Family Systems (IFS), yoga teacher training, sound healing, and Reiki. In Nepal, during a three-day silent fasting retreat, stillness made something clear: I wanted to create a space where people can come home to themselves.

Heart 2 Heart Somatics grew from this lived experience. My work is gentle, grounded, and paced to what feels safe—supporting you in stress regulation, body connection, and inner balance, in person or online.
about.imageAlt: Portrait-style image representing personal growth and calm

t1.quote: Mariem's sound healing felt like dreaming and flying - I arrived tired and left deeply rested, almost like after a nourishing holiday. Her gentle voice and warm space touched my heart
t1.name: Jolin

t2.quote: Working with Mariem has been deeply transformative - she holds space with rare warmth, compassion, and intuitive wisdom. Her blend of IFS and somatic work helped me reconnect with myself in profound ways. If you're looking for someone who genuinely cares and has the wisdom and skills to support your healing, i can't recommend Mariem highly enough!
t2.name: Omnia

t3.quote: Mariem's sound bath during the lunar eclipse was a powerful ritual that left my body and soul vibrating in harmony. I felt realignment, clarity, and deep feminine connection return to me.
t3.name: Monika

pricing.title: Packages
pricing.subtitle: Everything is tailored to your needs. We'll build your package together—based on your goals, schedule, and what feels supportive.

bullets.b1: Build your own package—based on what you need right now.
bullets.b2: Choose from Sound Healing, Yoga & Meditation, Somatic Coaching, and IFS.

bullets.b2: Business Yoga for teams (on-site or online).

bullets.b4: Team building experiences with embodied practices.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: A few quick answers to help you feel oriented before you book.

q1.a: We start with a short check-in and an intention for the session. Then we move into a guided practice (e.g., somatic grounding, breath, gentle movement, sound). We close with integration—so you leave with clarity, a calmer baseline, and simple next steps you can take into daily life.

q2.q: Do I need experience with yoga, meditation, or somatics?
q2.a: No. Everything is beginner-friendly and adaptable. The focus is on body awareness and safety—not performance. You can always choose smaller, slower steps.

q3.q: Online or in-person—which should I choose?
q3.a: Both can be deeply effective. In-person offers a dedicated studio space and direct support. Online is flexible and works well if you prefer your own environment. You'll receive clear guidance either way, and we choose the format that best matches your goals and comfort.

q4.a: Packages are custom—built around your needs, your schedule, and what feels supportive. After a free welcome session, we recommend a rhythm (e.g., weekly, biweekly) and combine modalities that fit you. You can adjust anytime as your needs change.

q5.a: Heart 2 Heart Somatics offers somatic support, coaching, and education—not medical or psychotherapeutic treatment. If you're in acute crisis or need clinical care, we'll recommend the right professional support. If you're unsure, the free welcome session is a good first step.

q6.a: Please reschedule as early as possible if something changes. For late cancellations, the session may be charged depending on the notice period. You'll receive the exact policy when booking so everything is transparent.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.body:
1. Controller
Mariem Werhani (Heart 2 Heart Somatics)
Mercedesstr. 3, 30453 Hannover, Germany
Email: info@heart2heartsomatics.com (subject: “Privacy”)
Phone: 01515-5351628

2. Summary
This is a static single-page website. We do not use analytics or advertising trackers.

3. Hosting (GitHub Pages)
The site is delivered via GitHub Pages. When you access the site, technical connection data (e.g., IP address, device/browser data, time of access) is processed for delivery and security.

4. Local storage (settings)
Depending on your choices, the site stores language/theme/accessibility settings in your browser to provide the requested functionality.

5. External links
If you open external links (e.g., Calendly or Google), the privacy policy of that provider applies.

Last updated: 2026-02-15

accessibility.title: Accessibility statement
accessibility.body:
This accessibility statement applies to the “Heart 2 Heart Somatics” website (single-page app incl. dialogs).

We aim to make the site as accessible as possible. No formal audit has been conducted yet.

Limitations
Third-party content (e.g., Calendly/Google) is outside our control.

Last updated: 2026-02-15

cookies.title: Cookies & local storage
cookies.description: We use strictly necessary storage to remember your accessibility, theme and language preferences. Optional categories are off by default and require your consent.

settings.title: Cookie preferences
settings.description: Adjust optional categories. Necessary storage is always enabled.

necessary.label: Necessary
necessary.help: Required for the site to function and for your preference settings.

analytics.label: Analytics
analytics.help: Helps us understand usage. Only applies if analytics tools are added later.

marketing.label: Marketing
marketing.help: External media / marketing cookies. Only applies if third-party embeds are added later.
